org.wso2.carbon.identity.oidc.session.cache

Class OIDCSessionParticipantCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.common.cache.BaseCache<OIDCSessionParticipantCacheKey,OIDCSessionParticipantCacheEntry>
      • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oidc.session.cache.OIDCSessionParticipantCache

  • public class OIDCSessionParticipantCache
extends org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.common.cache.BaseCache<OIDCSessionParticipantCacheKey,OIDCSessionParticipantCacheEntry>
    This is the class which caches OIDC session state information

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToCache(OIDCSessionParticipantCacheKey key, OIDCSessionParticipantCacheEntry entry)
      Adds session information to the cache Cache key includes the browser state cookie id Cache entry includes the authenticated user, and clients authenticated for that user who participates in the same browser session
      void clearCacheEntry(OIDCSessionParticipantCacheKey key)
      Clears the session information from the cache and remove from persistence store
      static OIDCSessionParticipantCache getInstance()
      Returns OIDCSessionParticipantCache singleton instance
      OIDCSessionParticipantCacheEntry getValueFromCache(OIDCSessionParticipantCacheKey key)
      Retrieve the session information from the cache.

      • Methods inherited from class org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.common.cache.BaseCache

        addListener, clear, getCacheTimeout, getCapacity, isEnabled, setCapacity

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • addToCache

        public void addToCache(OIDCSessionParticipantCacheKey key,
                       OIDCSessionParticipantCacheEntry entry)
        Adds session information to the cache Cache key includes the browser state cookie id Cache entry includes the authenticated user, and clients authenticated for that user who participates in the same browser session

      • getValueFromCache

        public OIDCSessionParticipantCacheEntry getValueFromCache(OIDCSessionParticipantCacheKey key)
        Retrieve the session information from the cache. At a cache miss data is loaded from the persistence store
        Overrides:
        getValueFromCache in class org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.common.cache.BaseCache<OIDCSessionParticipantCacheKey,OIDCSessionParticipantCacheEntry>
        Parameters:
        key - CacheKey Key which cache entry is indexed.
        Returns:
